items.description: Rivers Duddon, Crake and Mill Beck

floodArea.riverOrSea: River Duddon, River Crake, Mill Beck

items.message: River levels remain high on the Rivers Duddon, Crake and Mill Beck due to rainfall overnight on Monday 1/8/2022 and into Tuesday morning. Flooding may affect low lying land and roads near these rivers and their tributaries during Tuesday and so we are warning the public to be careful. There is little further rainfall forecast during Tuesday, and river levels are expected to fall. We are monitoring rainfall and river levels and are checking rivers for blockages in the area. Plan driving routes to avoid low lying roads near rivers, which may be flooded, and do not walk or cycle through floods. This message will be updated later today, 02/08/2022, or as the situation changes.

floodArea.riverOrSea: River Brathay, River Rothay, River Winster

items.message: River levels remain high on the Rivers Brathay, Rothay and Winster due to rainfall overnight on Monday 1/8/22 and into Tuesday morning. Flooding may affect low lying land and roads near these rivers and their tributaries during Tuesday and so we are warning the public to be careful if they do not know the area well. There is little further rainfall forecast during Tuesday, and river levels are expected to fall. We are monitoring rainfall and river levels and are checking rivers for blockages in the area. Plan driving routes to avoid low lying roads near rivers, which may be flooded, and do not walk or cycle through floods. This message will be updated later today, 02/08/2022, or as the situation changes.
